title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. VII, pt. 2380 - Wage Reporting System
content:

State Regulations
§ 2380.1 - Requirements for filing wage reporting system report
§ 2380.2 - Definition of employer
§ 2380.3 - Definition of employment
§ 2380.4 - Definition of gross wages
§ 2380.5 - Form of reports
§ 2380.6 - Filing requirements
§ 2380.7 - Information to be filed
§ 2380.8 - Magnetic media
§ 2380.9 - Penalties
§ 2380.10 - Corrections
§ 2380.11 - Secrecy of wage reporting information
§ 2380.12 - Records to be kept

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. VII, pt. 2380

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 171-a, 697[a], 697[e]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
